targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: I am here, and it does make sense. I came back to 1955 with the you from 1985 to get a book back from Biff. So once we got the book back, you...that is, the you from 1985...were in the DeLorean when it got struck by lightning and you got sent back to 1885!

contextAfter.text: It's a very interesting story, Future Boy, but there's one little thing that doesn't make sense. If the me of the future is now in the past, how could you possibly know about it?

"Dear Marty: If my calculations are correct, you will receive this letter immediately after you saw the DeLorean struck by lightning. First, let me assure you that I am alive and well. I have been living happily these past eight months in the year 1885. The lightning bolt that hit the DeLorean caused a jigawatt overload which scrambled the time circuits, activated the flux capacitor, and sent me back to 1885. The overload shorted out the time circuits and destroyed the flying circuits. Unfortunately, the car will never fly again."

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
